changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.users ( user_id bigserial NOT NULL , nickname varchar(255) NOT NULL, email varchar(255) NOT NULL, activation_code varchar(255), password varchar(255) NOT NULL, first_name varchar(255) NOT NULL, second_name varchar(255), last_name varchar(255) NOT NULL, birthday timestamp, status varchar(255), CONSTRAINT users_pkey PRIMARY KEY (user_id), CONSTRAINT email_unique UNIQUE (email) );
